events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated for several days.
The issue has been categorized as a Delivery Delay based on the customer's report of a late shipment and stagnant tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to the customer service agent handling delayed delivery concerns.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. Let me check the status for you.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have, so I can investigate the shipping status further?
Sure, my order number is 5489321 and the tracking number is TRK987654321. The last update was 5 days ago in transit.
I’ve contacted the shipping carrier to prioritize your delivery and requested an updated estimated arrival date. We expect your package within 3 days.
Thank you for looking into this quickly. I appreciate your help and will wait for the updated delivery information.
Your package was delivered today. Please confirm when you receive it so we can close the case.
Just checking in to confirm you received your order successfully. Let us know if there's anything further we can assist with.
Yes, I received the package yesterday. Everything is in perfect condition. Thanks for your support.
The case has been closed following confirmation of delivery satisfaction from the customer.
A satisfaction survey invitation has been sent to the customer to gather feedback on the support experience.
